verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <WH4609> ham-ma-'a-Lot; of degrees מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים <WH4615> mi-ma-'a-mak-Kim Out of the depths קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <WH7121> ke-ra-Ti-cha have I cried יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto thee O LORD

אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Lord שִׁמְעָ֪ה <WH8085> shim-'Ah hear בְק֫וֹלִ֥י <WH6963> ve-Ko-Li my voice תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> tih-Yei-nah Let אָ֭זְנֶיךָ <WH241> 'A-ze-nei-cha let thine ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <WH7183> kash-shu-Vot; be attentive לְ֝ק֗וֹל <WH6963> le-Kol, to the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-Nai. of my supplications

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If עֲוֹנ֥וֹת <WH5771> a-vo-Not iniquities תִּשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> tish-mor- shouldest mark יָ֑הּ <WH3050> Yah; If thou LORD אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, O Lord מִ֣י <WH4310> mi who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> ya-'a-Mod. who shall stand

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עִמְּךָ֥ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha there הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה <WH5547> has-se-li-Chah; But [there is] forgiveness לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an, that תִּוָּרֵֽא׃ <WH3372> tiv-va-Re. with thee that thou mayest be feared

קִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6960> kiv-Vi-ti I wait יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD קִוְּתָ֣ה <WH6960> kiv-ve-Tah doth wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; my soul וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ <WH1697> ve-lid-va-Ro and in his word הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH3176> ho-Chal-ti. do I hope

נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi My soul לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <WH136> la-do-Nai; [waiteth] for the Lord מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> mish-sho-me-Rim more than they that watch לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> lab-Bo-ker, for the morning שֹׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> sho-me-Rim [I say more than] they that watch לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> lab-Bo-ker. for the morning

יַחֵ֥ל <WH3176> ya-Chel hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Let Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in יְה֫וָה <WH3068> Yah-weh in the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for with the LORD הַחֶ֑סֶד <WH2617> ha-Che-sed; [there is] mercy וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> ve-har-Beh and with him [is] plenteous עִמּ֣וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with פְדֽוּת׃ <WH6304> fe-Dut. redemption

וְ֭הוּא <WH1931> Ve-hu and He יִפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> yif-Deh And he shall redeem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> mik-Kol, all עֲוֹנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5771> 'a-vo-no-Tav. from all his iniquities
